text: Egha Iesus akar isɨn zuir kamɨn me geghari, “Gumazitamɨn korotiar ghurim torim an ikɨtɨ, a korotiar igiatam abigh, inir avɨzir kam isɨ, korotiar ghurim dukuagh a isaman markɨ. A kamaghɨn damightɨ, korotiar igiar kam arɨzigham. Egh uaghan inir avɨzir igiar korotiar ghurim dukuagha isamizim, korotiar ghurimɨn mɨn ganan kogham.
